title: Add parsers list to statistics service - possibly make MBeans for them
description:
The list of available QParsers in QParserPlugin.standardPlugins is not available via the StatsComponent. It would be useful to see the list of configured names and parsers.

More useful, QParsers could MBeans, the number of  searches parsed etc. could be tracked.
